data.name: Blood and Zombies - Skins Pack 1
data.detailed_description:
Energize!

This pack includes energy-themed skins for the following firearms and melee weapons:

Firearms:

  • Mercenary
  • Patriot
  • Tiger
  • The Legacy
  • Hunter
  • Destroyer
  • Saboteur
  • Sniper
  • Flamethrower
  • 9mm Handgun
  • Samurai
  • Savage
  • Shotgun
  • PM Pistol
  • Revolver

Melee Weapons:

  • Baseball Bat
  • Knife
  • Sledgehammer
  • Chainsaw
  • Circular Saw
data.about_the_game:
Energize!

This pack includes energy-themed skins for the following firearms and melee weapons:

Firearms:

  • Mercenary
  • Patriot
  • Tiger
  • The Legacy

  • Destroyer

  • Sniper

Melee Weapons:

  • Chainsaw
  • Circular Saw
data.short_description: In this skins pack expansion to the original game, unlock the energy skins for your favorite zombie-slaying weapons!
data.supported_languages: English, Russian, Simplified Chinese, German, Italian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-6600k / AMD Ryzen 3 1300X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD R9 285 4GB / Nvidia GTX 770 4GB
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Recommended 1920x1080, 30FPS
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7-8700 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX 580 8GB / Nvidia GTX 1060 6GB
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Recommended 1920x1080, 60FPS
